ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Hardware
ygData.msgSnippet: I was just going to say that. I think even a vid card with a gig of memory would still lag in the bazaar (I realize such a card doesn t exist, just used that
ygData.messageBody:
I was just going to say that. I think even a vid card
with a gig of memory would still lag in the bazaar (I
realize such a card doesn't exist, just used that for
the sake of arguement, lol)

Zero clip plane is your friend. :)

--- Su <suceress@...> wrote:
>
> I have yet to meet someone who has not lagged in the
> bazaar.
> luv,
> -Su
>
>
> > I play on a laptop: P4 1.19GHz, 512MB RAM,
> GeoForce2Go video card,
> > Windows XP. I have a TERRIBLE lag in Bazaar, and
> sometimes in PoK.
> > You guys think I should upgrade my video card? I
> know Sony doesn't
> > support playing on a laptop, but aside from the
> lag in those two
> > areas, it's working quite well.
>
>


=====
~~~~~~~~~

And on the eighth day God said, "O.K. Murphy. You take over."
